nodes.name: getUnderlyingPrice

attributes.name: getUnderlyingPrice

params.cToken: The cToken to get the underlying price of

getUnderlyingPrice(address).return: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18). Zero means the price is unavailable.

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a cToken asset
